record.description: Tenth Anniversary Reunion (December 2, 1952) of scientists at the Stagg Field squash court site, honoring the first controlled nuclear chain reaction of December 2, 1942. Speakers: Lawrence A. Kimpton (standing), Enrico Fermi, and Arthur H. Compton (seated). Audience, first row, right to left: Samuel K. Allison, Herbert L. Anderson, Crawford H. Greenewalt, Leona Woods Marshall, Walter H. Zinn, Leo Szilard, and Norman Hilberry. Second row: George L. Weil, Harold F. Spedding, Philip G. Koontz, Robert G. Nobles, Wilcox Overbeck, Volney C. Wilson, and Leo Seren. Third row: Thomas Brill, Stewart A. Fox, Darrol K. Froman, W. Rudolph Kanne, Herbert E. Kubitschek, George D. Monk Jr., (not seen in picture) Gerald S. Pawlicki, and Hugh M. Barton Jr.
